docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 22 -- Disclosures of the existence in Argentina of a vast spy ring, which, under orders of the German Embassy in Buenos Aires, operated throughout South America, were made in a memorandum submitted by the United States today...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 22 -- Disclosures of the existence in Argentina of a vast spy ring, which, under orders of the German Embassy in Buenos Aires, operated throughout South America, were made in a memorandum submitted by the United States today to the Emergency Advisory Committee for Political Defense of the Continent in Montevideo.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 23 -- With the arrival today of Dr. Alberto Guani, Foreign Minister and Vice President-elect of Uruguay, for an official visit a definite prospect developed that Uruguay would resume diplomatic relations with the Soviet Union.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 25 -- Increased vigilance and ever-closer collaboration in defense of the Western Hemisphere against the Axis powers was urged by Dr. Alberto Guani, Vice President-elect and Minister of Foreign Affairs of Uruguay at the twenty-third...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 25 -- Increased vigilance and ever-closer collaboration in defense of the Western Hemisphere against the Axis powers was urged by Dr. Alberto Guani, Vice President-elect and Minister of Foreign Affairs of Uruguay at the twenty-third plenary session here today of the Inter-American Defense Board.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Jan. 30 -- Argentina is in danger of finding herself materially as well as morally isolated. Economic problems created by the war have a tendency to grow more acute as time passes, and Argentina, which has been drawing heavily upon her...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Jan. 30 -- Argentina is in danger of finding herself materially as well as morally isolated. Economic problems created by the war have a tendency to grow more acute as time passes, and Argentina, which has been drawing heavily upon her reserves during the last year, can hardly expect the next twelve months to be as prosperous as those just ended.
